hotels.title: Israel Six Senses Luxury with World-Class Spa
hotels.description: Indulge at the renowned Six Senses Shaharut, a gem amid Israel's Negev Desert where sunsets melt into orange dunes. This tranquil escape is seamlessly integrated into a dramatic cliff and aims to redefine exceptional experiences, offering total privacy within the majestic Middle Eastern mountains. Foodies will savour the resort’s exceptional restaurants, which combine the best of Israeli and Mediterranean influences. From a show kitchen overlooking the desert sands to a poolside grill, each destination offers a completely unique experience. Ready to relax? The world-class Six Senses Spa offers single and double treatment rooms, saunas and hammams, indoor and outdoor pools and a gym.
